thread.title: Heather Morris Leaves Glee Behind With a Stunning DWTS Performance
thread.title_full: Heather Morris Leaves Glee Behind With a Stunning DWTS Performance

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Heather Morris Leaves Glee Behind With a Stunning DWTS Performance
text:
Heather Morris Waltzes on Dancing With the Stars Heather Morris Leaves Glee Behind With a Stunning DWTS Performance March 20, 2017 169 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
Simone Biles may have earned the top score of the night, but it's Heather Morris who everyone is talking about after her gorgeous waltz on the season premiere of Dancing With the Stars . Morris, who some argue has an unfair advantage, what with her past as a background dancer for Beyoncé and all , danced with partner Maks Chmerkovskiy to "Make Something Beautiful" by Ben Rector. The judges gave her a score of 28, meaning she's currently tied with Nancy Kerrigan and David Ross for third place. She's sandwiched right in between Rashad Jennings, who cha-chaed to Bruno Mars , and Normani Kordei, who quickstepped to Erin Bowman. Take a look!
